title: Dictionary to List
description: In this lab, you will learn how to convert a dictionary to a list of tuples in Python, which is a common operation in data processing and manipulation tasks.

meta.description: Learn how to convert a Python dictionary to a list of tuples using a simple function.
meta.keywords: python, list, dictionary, data conversion, tuple
